comments:
OAW ships with the obsolete JDOM version "1.0beta10" which is unfortunately not
compatible with the current version "1.0".
Thus one gets the following compile error when integrating OAW into a build
environment that uses the latest JDOM:
    java.lang.NoSuchMethodError:
org.jdom.Parent.addContent(ILorg/jdom/Content;)Lorg/jdom/Parent;
    at
org.openarchitectureware.core.frontends.xmi.toolsupport.uml.magicdraw.MagicDrawModuleMerger.merge(MagicDrawModuleMerger.java:302)

I suggest that MagicDrawModuleMerger should be updated and that JDOM 1.0 should
be included in OAW.

FIXED

- added jdom-1.0.jar to core.lib
- updated manifest
- fixed MagicDrawModuleMerger
